summary: Website project with phone number removed, login button removed, email updated to thejuristshyd@gmail.com, and theme reverted to 42nd draft style.

existing_features.title: Replace all occurrences of the current email address in the frontend with 'thejuristshyd@gmail.com'. This includes ContactPage.tsx, Footer.tsx, and any other component or page that displays an email address.

Revert the visual theme (color palette, typography, spacing, component styling, and any decorative elements) to match the 42nd draft version of the site. Apply this theme consistently across all pages and components including Header, Footer, HomePage, ContactPage, AboutPage, ServicesPage, and all other visible pages.
